name: CXCallUpdate
desc: An encapsulation of new and changed information about a call.

items.name: var localizedCallerName: String?
items.desc: The localized name of the caller.

items.name: var remoteHandle: CXHandle?
items.desc: The handle for the remote party (for an incoming call, this is the caller; for an outgoing call, this is the callee).

items.name: var hasVideo: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call includes video in addition to audio.

items.name: var supportsGrouping: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call can be grouped with other calls.

items.name: var supportsUngrouping: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call can be ungrouped from other calls.

items.name: var supportsHolding: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call can be placed on hold or removed from hold.

items.name: var supportsDTMF: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call can send DTMF (dual tone multifrequency) tones via hard pause digits or in-call keypad entries.
